column5: Any shoppers that head to the US side...  I just picked up a buddy heater at Tractor Suply co. For 69.99...  These are 99.99 reg price at cabelas...  Not sure if the sale is at all TSC stores but I thought id let you all know...  Bonus... These ones are green instead of red... Great for hunters...

I posted a classified ad here today for a Big Buddy Heater (18000btu) for $110....brand new in box. Big Buddy is $190 + tax at Princess Auto.  Please delete if this post plugging my ad is breaking any rules-I will only post once.
I want the blackcat heater I can turn on it's side!  Waiting for it to go onsale at PA.

Hmmm...checked and it still is $99 at Tractor Supply (US). Plus taxes of course but might 'hurt sales"...luckily I only have the one. Curious, same heater on same page is $130 at Tractor Supply if CARB compliant....Mr Heater makes 2 versions of these heaters. http://tsc.tractorsupply.com/search?w=Big+Buddy&searchButton.x=24&searchButton.y=10
That's a California model...  Some states have different rules I guess...
